description: The updated Rush 2 Mid GTX strikes the perfect balance between agility and support. The mid-high mesh and synthetic upper is backed by GORE-TEX® to guarantee waterproof protection, while the Presa® sole delivers outstanding stability and traction. With the feel of a running shoe and the support of a hiking boot, the Rush 2 GTX is the perfect choice for a variety of trail pursuits.
name: Scarpa Rush 2 Mid GTX - Mens

specs.value: Eco Mesh + Eco Microfiber + Eco Film
